title: What are the craziest Roller Coasters in the world???
description:
Our friends at MEL Science are back with amazing monthly at-home science kits for YOU - a nd a special discount for our Smartypants. Use code SMARTY at MEL Science or just go to this link and get started doing science, every month, right at home!

Who Smarted's? Sea Camp Live starts TOMORROW - sign up is closed but if you're joining us - can't wait to see you on the sub!

What goes up must come down, and that's true of everything - including Roller Coasters! Who had the bright idea of flinging people at high speeds around a track ? And why are roller coasters so much fun even though they're kinda scary? Keep your hands and arms inside the ride for this very fun episode of Who Smarted?

Quickest way to hear YOUR name on Who Smarted? Leave us a great 5-star review on Apple podcasts, include your first name, and you might hear yours on an upcoming episode.

For free home science activities and helpful stuff for classrooms and homeschool sign-up for our free newsletter at www.WhoSmarted.com

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
